TouchEventAltKey.summary: The read-only altKey property of the interface returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the <kbd>alt</kbd> (Alternate) key is enabled when the touch event is created. If the <kbd>alt</kbd> key is enabled, the attribute's value is true. Otherwise, it is false.
TouchEventAltKey.value: A boolean value that is true if the <kbd>alt</kbd> key is enabled for this event; and false if the <kbd>alt</kbd> is not enabled.
